content: work the pattern-repeat of 10 sts 6/7/8/9/10 times end with the last 2 sts of the chart continue work as instructed above until work measures 9/10/11/13/14 cm = 3 5/4/4 25/5/5 5 measured from the underarm where you split for front and back and ending on a ws row please note that you may end on any pattern-row ws on the following rs row work the first 19/23/27/31/33 sts k1 p1 x 9/11/13/15/17 plus k1 leave the remaining 44/50/56/62/70 sts on a separate holder or waste-yarn if leaving the sts on waste yarn please make sure to secure the yarn properly to avoid dropping the sts don t break yarn turn work and continue work across the 19/23/27/32/33 sts for the rib-patterned buttonhole-band row 1 ws work in rib-pattern as established in the rs row above row 2 rs create 2/2/3/3/4 buttonholes work 5/5/4/5/3 sts in rib-pattern as est bind off 2 sts work 4/6/5/6/5 sts in rib-pattern as established repeat - 1/1/2/2/3 more time s work to rem 2 sts in rib-pattern as established row 3 ws work as established to the first buttonhole-gap cast on 2 sts work to the following gap as established cast on 2 sts work as established to end of row work 2 more row in rib-pattern as established bind off all sts from rs in rib-pattern as the sts are showing knit or purl break and secure yarn follow instructions for the upper front on page 6 5 r o w 1 0 w r o w 8 w s r o w 6 w s r o w 4 w s r o w 2 w s t h e la in th e s s t s r o w t x x x 1 0 9 p a x x tte 8 r n x x 7 -r e x x 6 p e a x x x x x 5 4 t s ts 1 - 1 3 0 x x 2 x x 1 x t h in r o r o r o r o r o e fir s t 2 th e r o w w w w w w s 9 7 5 3 1 ts r r r r r s s s s s k x x e y t k p p k o n u u n s y it o r l o r l o it o m n n n n b r r w w o l s s s s s upper front carefully transfer the 63/73/83/93/103 sts held on holders/waste-yarn for the front to the same needle as used for the upper back work as explained for the upper back until work measures 7/8/9/11/12 cm = 2 75/3/3 5/4/4 25/ measured from the underarm where you split for front and back and ending with a ws row on the following rs row divide sts for left and right side of front bind off sts
